alert.note: Alert for Gilchrist; Southern Columbia; Suwannee; Western Alachua (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 27 at 9:41AM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Gilchrist, northwestern Alachua, southwestern Columbia and southeastern Suwannee Counties through 1015 AM EDT... At 940 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking an area of strong thunderstorms near Bell, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Lake City, Trenton, Bell, Ichetucknee Spring, Columbia, High Springs, Fort White, Obrien, Newberry and Branford. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Gilchrist; Southern Columbia; Suwannee; Western Alachua
